item.title: Sohum Shah on 'Laapataa Ladies' missing Oscar entry: Oscar is not the sole benchmark for great cinema - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Sohum Shah on 'Laapataa Ladies' missing Oscar entry: Oscar is not the sole benchmark for great cinema

Publication Date: [Not Provided] Source: [Not Provided]

In a recent statement, Sohum Shah addressed the absence of his film 'Laapataa Ladies' from the Oscar nominations, emphasizing that the Oscars should not be viewed as the ultimate measure of cinematic success.

  • Sohum Shah discusses the significance of artistic merit beyond awards.
  • He states that honoring diverse storytelling is crucial for the film industry.
  • 'Laapataa Ladies' received critical acclaim, despite not being nominated for an Oscar.
"Oscar is not the sole benchmark for great cinema." - Sohum Shah

This highlights Shah's belief in valuing films for their connection with audiences rather than just accolades.

item.title: Here is the list of OTT movies and series releasing this week - 123telugu
item.description:
This Week's Exciting OTT Movie and Series Releases

Published on: Dec 19, 2024 8:03 pm IST

As 2024 draws to a close, the third week of December brings a wave of exciting movies and series perfect for cozying up at home. Check out this list of must-watch releases to make the most of your time indoors.

item.title: Superman Teaser Trailer Out, Features Superdog Krypto And Hawk Girl - NDTV Movies
item.description:
Superman Teaser Trailer Out, Features Superdog Krypto And Hawk Girl

Date: New Delhi

The much-awaited teaser trailer for James Gunn's Superman is finally released, showcasing David Corenswet as the new Superman amidst other beloved DC characters.

  • The teaser shows Superman injured in a snowy landscape, with Krypto the Superdog saying, 'Take me home.'
  • Introduces key characters including Clark Kent, Lois Lane, Lex Luthor, and Jimmy Olsen.
  • Features glimpses of newcomers like Hawkgirl, Mister Terrific, and others from the DC universe.
  • David Corenswet takes on the iconic role, marking his biggest Hollywood project yet.
  • James Gunn emphasizes the essence of Superman's humanity and kindness in the film.
“The next Superman has to be someone who has all the humanity that Superman has but he's also an alien.” - James Gunn

With the release of this teaser, excitement builds for a new interpretation of Superman by David Corenswet under the directorial vision of James Gunn.

item.title: Superman Teaser Trailer: May The Force Be With David Corenswet - NDTV Movies
item.description:
Superman Teaser Trailer: May The Force Be With David Corenswet

Publication Date: New Delhi

The highly anticipated teaser trailer for James Gunn's new Superman film has been released, introducing David Corenswet in the iconic role.

  • The teaser shows Superman in a snowy landscape, injured, with a notable quote: "Take me home" when Krypto the Superdog approaches him.
  • David Corenswet portrays both Superman and his alter ego, Clark Kent, who works for The Daily Planet.
  • Key characters introduced include Lois Lane, Lex Luthor, and Jimmy Olsen.
  • Other DC characters making appearances include Mister Terrific, Guy Gardner, Hawkgirl, and Metamorpho.
  • James Gunn emphasizes that the new Superman embodies humanity and kindness despite being an alien.
“The next Superman has to be someone who has all the humanity that Superman has but he's also an alien.” - James Gunn

This film marks David Corenswet's biggest Hollywood project to date, being the fourth actor to take on the Superman role.

item.title: Meet Shubman Gill's love and strength who is a famous social media influencer, her name is... - India.com
item.description:
Meet Shubman Gill's Sister and Influencer Shahneel

Date: [Date not provided] Source: India.com

Shubman Gill, frequently referred to as the 'Prince of Indian cricket,' has won over fans with his remarkable batting talent. However, away from the spotlight, his sister, Shahneel Gill, also stands out in her own way.

  • Shahneel Gill is an emerging social media influencer.
  • She works as a success specialist at SkipTheDishes.
  • Shubman and Shahneel were raised in Fazilka, Punjab.
  • Shahneel supports Shubman's cricket career publicly through social media.
  • She completed her education at Red River College Polytechnic in Canada.
“The close sibling connection has had a significant impact on Shubman's cricket career.”

Shahneel Gill is not only a supportive sister but also a growing influencer in her own right, showcasing her aspirations and maintaining a successful career alongside her brother's sporting achievements.

item.title: Pushpa 2 box office collection day 15 early report: Allu Arjun film earns over 1500 crore worldwide - The Indian Express
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Box Office Collection Day 15 Early Report

Publication Date: December 20, 2024 | Source: Indian Express

Pushpa 2 has been dominating the box office ever since its release on December 5, crossing the Rs 1500 crore milestone worldwide in just 15 days.

  • The film has earned over Rs 980 crore nett in India.
  • As of day 15, it earned Rs 10.95 crore with significant occupancy rates.
  • Pushpa 2 has outperformed its initial budget of Rs 450 crore by four times.
  • There are concerns about its future performance with upcoming releases like Viduthalai and Baby John.
The HISTORIC RULE at the box office continues 💥💥 #Pushpa2TheRule becomes the FASTEST INDIAN FILM to Gross 1500+ CRORES WORLDWIDE in 14 Days ❤‍🔥

Conclusion: While Pushpa 2 continues to break box office records, its future may be challenged by competing releases, but it still shows impressive performance in its initial run.

item.title: Aishwarya Rai holds Amitabh Bachchan by the arm as they attend Aaradhya’s school event with Abhishek Bachchan. Watch - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Aishwarya Rai and Amitabh Bachchan Attend Daughter's School Event Together

Date: Dec 19, 2024 07:25 PM IST
Source: Hindustan Times

Aishwarya Rai was recently seen with her husband Abhishek Bachchan and father-in-law Amitabh Bachchan at her daughter Aaradhya's school annual day in Mumbai, putting to rest rumors of marital discord.

  • Aishwarya attended the event dressed in Indian ethnic wear.
  • The family was seen interacting warmly with event organizers.
  • This public appearance counters recent rumors regarding Aishwarya and Abhishek's marriage.
“Now this rests all the rumours once for all. Now the news people will have to look for other greener pastures.”

This sighting highlights the unity of the Bachchan family amid speculation, as they continue to engage publicly despite previous rumors.

item.title: Ranbir Kapoor's niece Samara Sahni can't stop smiling as she enjoys fan moment with AP Dhillon - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Ranbir Kapoor's niece Samara Sahni can't stop smiling as she enjoys fan moment with AP Dhillon

Date: Dec 19, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Samara Sahni, niece of Bollywood actor Ranbir Kapoor, attended AP Dhillon's recent concert in Delhi and was thrilled to meet the popular Punjabi singer, leaving her all smiles.

  • Samara attended the concert with her father, Bharat Sahni.
  • She excitedly posed for photos with AP Dhillon, showcasing her joy.
  • Samara wore sunglasses featuring 'AP' initials and a white heart, adding to her fan girl vibe.
  • The concert was part of Dhillon's 'The Brownprint India Tour', which began on December 7.
“Samara couldn't stop smiling while posing with the singer.”

The event highlighted the joy of celebrity encounters and the excitement they bring to fans, showcased through Samara's joyful experience.

item.title: Sohum Shah on Laapataa Ladies' exit from Academy Awards race: Oscar is not a parameter to tell how a film should be made - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Sohum Shah opines on the matter of Laapataa Ladies not being shortlisted for Oscars 2025, and whether All We Imagine As Light would have been a better choice

Date: Dec 19, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Actor-filmmaker Sohum Shah discusses the exclusion of Laapataa Ladies from the Oscar race, emphasizing that winning an Oscar shouldn't dictate how films are made.

  • Laapataa Ladies, directed by Aamir Khan and Kiran Rao, was excluded from the Oscars 2025.
  • Sohum Shah believes Oscars do not define the quality of filmmaking.
  • He highlights the success of his film Tumbbad in its re-release, earning over ₹25 crores.
  • There was speculation that All We Imagine As Light would have been a better entry for the Oscars.
“Oscar is not a parameter to tell how a film should be made. It is not something to be so desperate and focused about.”

Shah concludes that the audience's reception of the film matters more than any awards.

item.title: Mukesh Khanna Makes Controversial Comment On Ranbir Kapoor Playing Lord Ram: 'If You're A Chhichhora...' - News18
item.description:
Mukesh Khanna Criticizes Ranbir Kapoor's Casting as Lord Ram

Date: December 19, 2024

Source: News18

Mukesh Khanna has raised eyebrows with his remarks concerning Ranbir Kapoor, who has been cast as Lord Ram in the upcoming film Ramayana. Khanna expressed concern that Kapoor's previous roles could affect how audiences perceive his portrayal of such a revered character.

  • Khanna hesitated to comment, fearing backlash, but affirmed that comparisons with Arun Govil are inevitable.
  • He stated that whoever plays Ram must embody the character in their real life as well.
  • Khanna highlighted that the public reception of actors like Prabhas should inform casting choices.
  • Ranbir Kapoor's role is significant for the Kapoor family, and he hopes Kapoor's recent negative portrayal in Animal won't overshadow his performance as Ram.
  • Details about other cast members include Sai Pallavi as Sita and potential casting for Hanuman.
“If you’re playing Ram, you’re not allowed to party and drink. But who am I to decide who plays Ram?” - Mukesh Khanna

The film is set to release in two parts, with the first part launching on Diwali 2026 and the second on Diwali 2027.

item.title: Pushpa 2 Hindi Box Office: Allu Arjun Cancels Aamir Khan’s 3,640 Days Old Record Despite Being The Toughest Nut To Crack! - Koimoi
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Hindi Box Office: Allu Arjun Cancels Aamir Khan’s 3,640 Days Old Record Despite Being The Tough

Publication Date: December 18, 2024   Source: Koimoi

Pushpa 2 has achieved remarkable success at the box office within its first 14 days, setting new records and surpassing previous milestones held by major films like Baahubali 2 and Aamir Khan's PK.

  • Pushpa 2 has set a new record for the highest-grossing Hindi dubbed South Indian film.
  • On its 14th day, the movie earned ₹17 crore, the highest collection for a Hindi film on that day.
  • The film has quickly risen in popularity, grossing a total of ₹618.50 crore within two weeks.

Notable Quotes or Statistics:

“Pushpa 2 has done the unthinkable, and its numbers are beasting at the box office even 14 days after the film has arrived, creating new records every single day.”

In conclusion, Pushpa 2 has not only broken long-standing records but has also reshaped the box office landscape for Hindi films, showcasing the massive appeal of South Indian cinema.

item.title: EXCLUSIVE: Anil Thadanis Pushpa 2 locks horns with Baby John over screens; leaves exhibitors in a bind with advance booking halted - Bollywood Hungama
item.description:
EXCLUSIVE: Anil Thadani’s Pushpa 2 locks horns with Baby John over screens; leaves exhibitors in a bind with advance booking halted

Publication Date: December 2023 Source: Bollywood Hungama

Pushpa 2 – The Rule continues to perform strongly but has faced issues with advance bookings due to a conflict between its distributor and that of Baby John, which releases on December 25.

  • Advance bookings for Pushpa 2 have been halted in many theaters for the coming weekend.
  • Anil Thadani, distributor of Pushpa 2, has mandated equal showings with Baby John for the holiday period.
  • The conflict is described as a tactical move by Thadani against PVR Inox Pictures, distributor of Baby John.
  • Theatres are waiting for a resolution to start bookings for Pushpa 2 while limited bookings have begun in some cinemas.
“If they don’t accept Thadani ji’s demands, theatres will not be able to play Pushpa 2 over this weekend.”

The ongoing conflict highlights the competitive nature of film releases during the holiday season, and both sides are working towards a compromise.

item.title: Pushpa 2 vs Baahubali 2 Box Office (14-Day Comparison): Allu Arjun Starrer Is Leading The Race With 185 Crore+ Earnings, Set To Emerge Victorious! - Koimoi
item.description:
Pushpa 2 vs Baahubali 2 Box Office (14-Day Comparison): Allu Arjun Starrer Is Leading The Race With 185 Crore+

Publication Date: December 19, 2024 | Source: Koimoi

Pushpa 2 is inching closer towards becoming the highest-grossing film in India.

  • Pushpa 2 has grossed 988.75 crores in its first 14 days.
  • Baahubali 2 made 803 crores in the same timeframe.
  • Pushpa 2 leads by 185.75 crores, aiming to surpass 1000 crores shortly.
  • Baahubali 2 concluded its run at 1031 crores.
Pushpa 2 is set to rewrite history at the domestic box office after 7 long years.

Stay tuned for more box office updates as Pushpa 2 approaches a historic milestone.

item.title: Kareena Kapoor Khan proudly cheers for son Jeh on his annual function; fans call her ‘that one enthusiastic mother’ - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Kareena Kapoor Khan Couldn't Contain Her Excitement as Son Jeh Ali Khan Performed at His Annual Function Recently

Date: Dec 19, 2024, Source: Hindustan Times

Kareena Kapoor Khan proudly cheered for her son Jeh during his school’s annual function, showcasing her enthusiastic support as he performed on stage.

  • Kareena attended the event with her husband Saif Ali Khan and their son Taimur.
  • The family cheered as Jeh, dressed in an elephant costume, performed confidently on stage.
  • Fans likened Kareena's excitement to her character Anjali from the film *Kabhi Khushi Kabhie Gham*.
  • Despite some negative comments, many social media users defended Kareena's maternal enthusiasm.
“Can't believe some parental love deprived people are trolling Kareena for cheering for her son's first school performance.”

This heartwarming moment has captured the attention of social media, illustrating the joy of parental support.

item.title: Devoleena Bhattacharjee welcomes her first child, a baby boy, with husband Shanawaz Shaikh - The Indian Express
item.description:
Devoleena Bhattacharjee Welcomes Baby Boy with Husband Shanawaz Shaikh

Updated: December 19, 2024 | Source: Indian Express

Actor Devoleena Bhattacharjee and her husband Shanawaz Shaikh have welcomed their first child, a baby boy, on December 18. The announcement was made by Devoleena via her Instagram.

  • Devoleena expressed her joy of becoming a mother on social media.
  • Fans and friends congratulated the couple in the comments section.
  • She shared a video stating, "Hello world! Our little angel BOY is here ♥️🧿 18•12•2024".
  • Devoleena married Shanawaz in December 2022.
“I’m excited about my new journey into motherhood. This birthday feels different and extra special for both me and my husband.” - Devoleena Bhattacharjee

This joyous moment marks a significant milestone in the couple's lives, as they embark on the journey of parenthood together.

item.title: TRP Toppers: Udne Ki Aasha, Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai hold strong, Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin drops - India Forums
item.description:
TRP Toppers: Udne Ki Aasha, Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai hold strong, Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin drops

Published: Thursday, December 19, 2024 at 10:35 AM

The latest TRP ratings have revealed notable changes in the rankings of popular television shows. While some have gained traction, others experienced minor dips. Here’s an in-depth analysis of this week’s TRP chart and the performance of audience-favourite series:

  1. Shiv Shakti Tap Tyaag Tandav: Maintains a TRP of 1.5 points.
  2. Parineeti: TRP dipped from 1.7 to 1.6 points.
  3. Mangal Lakshmi: TRP declines from 1.8 to 1.7 points.
  4. Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah: Jumped to 1.8 points from 1.7.
  5. Jhanak: TRP dropped from 1.9 to 1.8 points.
  6. Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin: Improved to 2.3 points from 2.2.
  7. Advocate Anjali Awasthi: Increased from 2.2 to 2.3 points.
  8. Anupamaa: Steady at 2.3 points.
  9. Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai: Climbed from 2.4 to 2.5 points.
  10. Udne Ki Aasha: Remains at 2.5 points, sustaining the top position.

item.title: Viduthalai 2’s duration reduced even before the release - 123telugu
item.description:
Viduthalai 2’s Duration Reduced Before Release

Published on: Dec 19, 2024 Source: 123telugu

Vetrimaaran’s much-anticipated sequel, Viduthalai 2, has reduced its runtime from 172 minutes to 164 minutes, even before its release. The film stars Vijay Sethupathi and Manju Warrier.

  • The film received an A certificate from the censor board like its predecessor Viduthalai 1.
  • The initial runtime was set at 172 minutes, but it was trimmed by 8 minutes after the final output review.
  • Vetrimaaran praised the actors and technicians, emphasizing the learning experience throughout the project.
“It’s a long journey. I thank all the actors and technicians for their contributions. I can only talk about efforts and the public who should say how the film is.” - Vetrimaaran

This adjustment aims to enhance the film's pacing and audience engagement prior to its release.

item.title: Actor-YouTuber Prasanth Behara arrested for sexually harassing female co-actor: Report - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Prasanth Behara Arrested for Sexual Harassment of Co-Actor

Date: December 19, 2024
Source: Hindustan Times

Prasanth Behara, a Telugu YouTuber and actor, has been arrested following allegations of sexual harassment by a female co-actor. The police confirmed that a complaint was filed against him for inappropriate behavior over several months.

  • Behara was arrested in Hyderabad following a complaint from a female co-actor.
  • The victim accused him of touching her indecently and behaving inappropriately during a web series shoot.
  • He was produced in court and remanded for 14 days.
  • The harassment reportedly included an incident where he attacked her after she returned home from filming.
  • Behara is known for his role in 'Committee Kurrollu' and will appear in 'Bachhala Malli.'
“The victim filed a complaint alleging that Prasad had been sexually harassing her for the last few months.”

The arrest highlights a disturbing trend among YouTubers and actors facing serious allegations in the industry.

item.title: Crisp runtime locked for Upendra’s UI - 123telugu
item.description:
Crisp Runtime Locked for Upendra’s UI

Published on Dec 19, 2024 3:02 pm IST

Kannada star Upendra's latest movie, UI, is set to release tomorrow in cinemas across multiple languages, including Telugu. The film, directed by Upendra himself, has a runtime of 2 hours and 12 minutes and explores globally pressing issues such as climate change, all while maintaining a satirical perspective on political dynamics.

  • Movie directed by Upendra, releasing in multiple languages.
  • Crisp runtime of 2 hours and 12 minutes.
  • The film addresses climate change and political dynamics.
  • Features a stellar cast including Sunny Leone and Murali Sharma.
  • Produced by Lahari Films and others, with music by Ajaneesh B Loknath.
“UI promises a high-octane, gripping experience from start to finish.”

This film blends social awareness with entertainment, indicating its dual purpose of engaging audiences while provoking thought on important issues.

item.title: John Cena vs Roman Reigns: Which WWE superstar has higher net worth - India.com
item.description:
John Cena vs Roman Reigns: Which WWE superstar has higher net worth

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: India.com

There’s an enduring debate among WWE fans, and it's all about deciding who is truly the greatest of all time. The argument frequently swings between John Cena and Roman Reigns, reflecting their dominance in the wrestling world.

  • John Cena has a net worth of approximately $80 million, primarily due to his career as a 16-time World Champion in WWE.
  • Roman Reigns has a net worth of $14 million and earns an estimated $5 million per year from WWE.
  • John Cena's WWE salary is reported to be around $10 million per year.
  • The financial comparison favors John Cena, highlighting his significant economic success in the wrestling industry.
"If we compare their financial status, it's clear that John Cena's economic success is tremendous, boasting an impressive net worth of $80 million. This notably overshadows Roman Reigns, whose net worth amounts to $14 million."

In conclusion, while both superstars have achieved remarkable careers in WWE, John Cena's financial achievements place him significantly ahead of Roman Reigns.

item.title: Kareena Kapoor channels Anjali from Kabhi Khushi Kabhie Gham as she cheers for Jeh at his school function. Watch - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Kareena Kapoor Channels Anjali from Kabhi Khushi Kabhie Gham While Cheering for Jeh at School Function

Dec 19, 2024 - Hindustan Times

Kareena Kapoor was seen at her son Jeh's school function, cheering him on as he performed. The moment was reminiscent of her character Anjali from the movie Kabhi Khushi Kabhie Gham, which resonated with fans.

  • Kareena attended the event with her husband Saif Ali Khan and elder son Taimur.
  • A viral video showed Kareena excitedly cheering for Jeh, who performed in an elephant costume.
  • Fans drew parallels between Jeh’s performance and Kajol’s character Anjali from the movie.
  • Kareena expressed her love for motherhood in her book, discussing the balance of being a mother and an actress.
Kareena Kapoor: “My mother is also a strong role model for me... I now have these two tots in my life who make every day feel a little crazy, a little special, a little exhausting, and a little rewarding.”

The event highlighted the joys of parenting and how celebrities like Kareena can resonate with everyday experiences, reminding many of their childhood and family dynamics.
